dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 79.5 x 44 cm (31 5/16 x 17 5/16 in.)
Repeat H (straight): 55.9 cm (22 in.)
title: Chintz
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 3 reds, 2 purples) applied by brush or pen (red over a resist). Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow (now faded) applied by brush (chintz).
description: Various flowers with trailing stems on a red ground.
name: Chintz
